solution_line_template: He read {pages_read_book1} pages from the {book1_total_pages} page book because {book1_total_pages} x {book1_percent_read} = <<{book1_total_pages}*{book1_percent_read}={pages_read_book1}>>{pages_read_book1}

He read {pages_read_book2} pages from the {book2_total_pages} page book because {book2_total_pages} x ({book2_fraction_read}) = <<{book2_total_pages}*({book2_fraction_read})={pages_read_book2}>>{pages_read_book2}
He has read {total_pages_read} pages in total.
He needs to read {pages_remaining} more pages to reach {reading_goal} pages because {reading_goal} - {total_pages_read} = <<{reading_goal}-{total_pages_read}={pages_remaining}>>{pages_remaining}
